flawed_nl_solution:
At first Jeff paid, $300/month x 12 months = $<<300*12=3600>>3600/year
He paid $3600/year x 3 years = $10800 the firsts 3 years.
The final 2 years he paid $350/month x 12 months = $<<350*12=4200>>4200/year
He paid $4200/year x 2 years = $<<4200*2=8400>>8400 the last 2 years.
He paid the owner $10800 + $8400 = $<<10800+8400=91200>>91200 in total.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19200, not 91200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
